# Day 1 

## Morgan, intro R


`methods` lists all methods available for a given class:

```{r}
methods(class = lm)
```
Getting specific help for a method call:
```{r, eval = FALSE}
?plot.lm
```
 
## Bioconductor intro

`nchar` counts the number of characters in each entry of character vector:

```{r}
seq = c("AAACA", "CATGC")
nchar(seq)
```

```{r}
"DNAStringSet"
```
